station

Class Station

  • java.lang.Object
    • station.Station
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Observable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    PlusStation, StandardStation

    public abstract class Station
extends java.lang.Object
implements Observable
    An abstract class to represent the stations. Each Station has a unique id (regardless of its type). A Station is part of a Network, has a position, a number of Slot objects. A Station is online when created.
    Author:
    Chloé
    See Also:
    StandardStation, PlusStation

      • dropBike

        public double dropBike(Card card,
                       java.time.LocalDateTime dropTime)
                throws NegativeTimeException,
                       NullDateException,
                       NoSlotAvailableException,
                       NoOngoingRideException,
                       StationOfflineException,
                       OngoingRideException
        This method allows to drop a Bike if the Station is online, if the User of the Card has an ongoing Ride and if there is an available Slot. If the Station becomes full, the changed attributes become true so that the observers are notified.
        Parameters:
        card -
        dropTime -
        Returns:
        price of the Ride
        Throws:
        NegativeTimeException
        NullDateException
        NoSlotAvailableException
        NoOngoingRideException
        StationOfflineException
        OngoingRideException
